metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18651 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Xpdf 4.00. catalog->getNumPages() in AcroForm.ccallows attackers to launch a denial of service (hang caused by large loop)via a specific pdf file, as demonstrated by pdftohtml. This is mainlycaused by a large number after the /Count field in the file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18651` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

xpdf - 3.04-7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xpdf package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.04-7').
ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
